bug.author: Echo9573
bug.description: When setting the model parameter vebose, the vebose type should be int and the values are 0, 1, 2. But the current verbose value is only 0 or 1. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/70420250-46055480-1aa2-11ea-82a0-60f59d08745c.png></denchmark-link>
